participant_1.background:
I had a hard time finding a job that fit my needs and skills.
I will not talk about my favorite food with others.
While my parents are of an older generation, my music taste is contemporary and eclectic.
I celebrated my birthday with my family and friends by listening to Taylor Swift's music and eating my favorite foods.
I lie to my children about eating healthy.

participant_2.background:
I recently got to share my love of sports with a larger audience.
I love to watch romantic comedies with my family because they make us laugh and feel good.
I wouldn't be able to be a Christmas tree decorator if I were blind.
I do not own a home, but I do enjoy traveling and sharing my experiences with the world.
i read tons of books.

content.text: What was your favorite part of your birthday?
I had to say the food was my favorite part. We had a lot of delicious food and desserts.
That is nice. I usually have a hard time finding a job that fits my needs and skills.
I am lucky to have found a job that I enjoy and that allows me to share my love of sports with others.
That is great! I love to watch sports as well, but I do not have a lot of friends who are into it.
I love watching romantic comedies with my family because they make us laugh and feel good. What are your favorite movies?
I really like the Harry Potter movies. They are a lot of fun to watch and they have great stories.
I have never seen any of the Harry Potter movies. I should probably watch them sometime.
You should! They are really good and I think you would enjoy them.
I will have to check them out. I have been meaning to watch them for a while now.
They are on Netflix, so you can watch them whenever you want.
Great! I will definitely check them out
